text: @HillaryClinton I know grade school teacher with COVID19 for 3 months and keep testing positive. I know some others teachers is deadly afraid to go back in class room right now b/c they know kids are super spreaders of the flu. No telling what going happen with COVID19 pandemic in class rooms.
